name: Los Shapis
description:
'''Los Shapis''' is a [[Peruvian cumbia|chicha]] musical group from [[Peru]]. They rose to prominence with their 1981 hit song "El Aguajal" (which means "the swamp"), a modern adaptation of traditional [[huayno]]. They were noted for their rainbow coloured costumes. The band's logo was designed by Rafael Trujillo Villacorta.

Los Shapis was one of the first chicha groups.
